docs.title: Shahnaaz Technical Documentation Sample
docs.text: Welcome! This document is built using McDocs, it is a lightweight static site generator written in python.

docs.title: Setup Guide
docs.text: Follow the steps given below to set up and run your documentation in your command 1. Install python and Pip from thr browser 2. Install Mkdocs using PIP Install Mkdocs 3. Create a new project 4. Navigate to the folder

docs.title: Writing content in the document
docs.text:
• All your documents will have home in the docs folder
  • Write in markdown ('.md') files
  • Add new sections as new .md files

docs.title: Export Options
docs.text:
• View your docs in HTML: 'Mkdocs Serve'
  • Build the site: 'mkdocs build'
  • Export to PDF using a browser print or a plugin

Thank you for visiting

docs.title: This is about page of the document that we are writing
docs.text: We have 4 members who will be able to help you out if you any questions 1. A 2. B 3. C 4. D

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text: These are the most common asked questions Q What is the project about? A The project will help you get more idea about your role Q What is the project about? A The project will help you get more idea about your role Q What is the project about? A The project will help you get more idea about your role

docs.title: Installation Guide
docs.text: Follow these steps to install the application in your mobile phone - Open the appstore and search for the software name - Click on install - Sign up with phone and email

docs.title: Usage of the tool
docs.text: Here's how you can use the tool to make the process easier - It would become easier to create new documents - You will be easily able to publish the outputs - You can edit the content whenever needed
